Text: Proposed Final Order Cc Dear Joe I have attached a proposed final order for your review Most of the language contained within the order is standard language with regard to the rights powers and duties as well as the visitation schedule under the Standard Possession Order I have also emphasized in bold lettering those areas in which some discussion is needed to finalize the document I understand that you will be meeting with Mr Fullenweider this afternoon and I hope you will have time to review this to discuss those issues with him I have attached the order in both Word and WordPerfect format If you use Word some of the formatting on the document will be off because I converted it from WordPerfect however the substance should be verbatim If you have any problems pulling this up let me know and I will get you a copy by alternate means Thanks Michael C Childs The Fullenweider Firm fax This electronic transmission may contain information that is privileged confidential andor exempt from disclosure under applicable law and is intended only for the use of the individual or entity named above If the reader of the message is not the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any dissemination distribution or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited If you have received this communication in error please notify the sender immediately by telephone Thank you Final Orderdoc Final Orderwpd

representationDear Joe Pursuant to our conversation of todays date you have cancelled a scheduled appointment which was intended for the preparation of Wednesdays hearing on Tonyas Special Appearance and Plea to the Jurisdiction Your preparation for this hearing is absolutely critical for any chance of retaining your case in Texas You further indicated that you would not reschedule the appointment for anytime prior to the hearing and gave me no indication of your intentions You and your mother have both expressed displeasure in your representation in this case It is apparent to me that this is no longer a productive working relationship Our inability to communicate in a productive manner and your refusal to participate in the preparation of your case lead me to only one conclusion I must withdraw from your representation in this matter I will be forwarding to you this afternoon a Motion to Withdraw as your counsel of record It is my intention to present the motion to the trial Court prior to the hearing on July Michael C Childs The Fullenweider Firm fax This electronic transmission may contain information that is privileged confidential andor exempt from disclosure under applicable law and is intended only for the use of the individual or entity named above If the reader of the message is not the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any dissemination distribution or copying of this communication is strictly prohibited If you have received this communication in error please notify the sender immediately by telephone Thank you
